website_summaries.verdict: A less expensive tire shine with the performance and results of more expensive options.
pros: Wet spray formula is easy to apply in a uniform, thorough manner
Offers UV protection to keep sun damage down to a minimum level
cons: Works best with other shine and cleaning products to get the best results

customer_reviews.title: Gets tires properly clean and ready for protection
customer_reviews.text: Lots of wheel cleaners say they will clean tires, but most require multiple passes. but this actually cleans tires! I don't even use it for wheels, only the tires. 4 Sprays around the tire for each, 16 sprays total. Instant browning, some agitation with a stiff brush and they are clean and black, no additional browning, ready for protection. I've done 4 cars and still have about 50% of the bottle left. It's inexpensive and economical. If they sold this in a gallon form I'd gladly buy it in that size, shame turtle wax doesn't do more for us in that way.
customer_reviews.author: VideoVince

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! But doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a good wheel cleaner. When I saw the combo, I decided to try it. The tire shine worked like any other shine. The real test was on the cleaner. It worked great! It was able to take off terrible brake dust off of a car that I was working on. Amazing! The only downside it that you need quite a bit to get it clean and because of that, this only lasted a total of three washes. I will be repurchasing but not as a duo as my tire shine is still completely full.
customer_reviews.author: Another Human

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Turtle Wax Wet'n Black works great on tires. Really makes the black pop. The running boards on my 2003 have been looking faded for years, no matter how I scrubbed and washed them. I tried the Wet'n Black on them and now they look brand new. Just be sure to wipe off the excess very well or the running boards will be slippery. They still look great after 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: GaryH

customer_reviews.title: Good Value. .  Works if your wheels and tires are relatively clean
customer_reviews.text: I must preface this by saying that my wheels are coated so they don't hold a lot of brake dust to begin with. I bought this for $4.00 (Actually $3.97) and it works just fine on my car. I wanted something that was an all it one. It works fine on my wheels and tires, but honestly, I do not have faith that it will work on heavier brake dust or tires that are especially dirty. It is a bit tough to get the previous applied tire dressing off. But look, for $4.00 it's a good deal. If you are looking for deep cleaning, spend the extra money and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My Audi S4 produces a lot of break dust, to wash my car I spray this on the wheels and then use a foam canon to soap up the whole car. By the time I rinse off the car this has done its job and I don't even have to scrub my wheels. Would recommend buying 2-3 depending how often you wash your car. (One has lasted me 4 washes)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea zaniboni

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the greatest stuff. I use a regular tire cleaner that they offer at the car washing place I go to and it's ok, but this stuff works almost instantly. You can see the rust and dirt just come out. I clean my car every Friday night and this stuff has made my job so much easier. The only problem is that you do have to use a fair amount, so this bottles lasted me a month and a half but it's well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Holly & Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Keeps tires looking black, but not the wet look
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to apply, just spray and leave it. Inwas hoping it would keep my tires to have that wet shine to it, but that quickly fades. It does keep your tires looking black and not dull or blotchy
customer_reviews.author: Tony Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I bought this to clean some brake dust that had been caked on some track-specific wheels that I bought used. Sadly, this cleaner was not able to remove the tough brake dust that was on the wheels but it removed the "fresh" brake dust off of my other wheels just fine! This would be ideal for someone with a new(er) car and/or new(er) wheels as long as you kept a consistent cleaning regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, tires look great.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff goes on easily, no buffing/rubbing required, just spray it on. 2 weeks later the tires still look great. Highly recommend this to give your car's appearance that extra bit of zing.
customer_reviews.author: GaryBerger

customer_reviews.title: Do not use on painted rims, works great on Aluminum wheels
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my two cars with two different type of rims. You need to thoroughly spray the rim and let is sit for a minute or two first. I pressure washed the rim next. It did remove the brake dust deposits/disolorations on the Aluminum wheels on my SUV without any issues. However, on my truck that has silver color painted metal wheels, it did discolor the rim and left it blotchy. I would not recommend using this product on painted rims.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I just sprayed it on my tires (I didn’t clean them before hand) and let the solution sit. Tires look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Invictus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I detailed my car today, including cleaning and shining my tires and wheels. The cleaner works great, got all the dirt and grime off my tires and rims. The tire shine is very good and easy to apply. I did my tires about 15 hours ago and they still look wet and very shiny. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No change after it dried.
customer_reviews.text: It smelled like tire shine that I have used in the past, but certainly did not have similar results. I will have to go with something else in the future. Read the directions, shook it well, etc. Even applied it twice, wiped/rubbed it in. Bad batch?
customer_reviews.author: IronMan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shine on the tires and inside the car.
customer_reviews.text: What I don't like is the way amzon ship it. I had one open on me and liquid got all on me.when I was open it.
customer_reviews.author: david montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, simple, shiny tires.
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty impressed with this product. I just sprayed my chrome rims and tires, and out came white foam. After about 30 seconds it was noticibly clear the white foam was turning brown from all the dirt and grime it was picking up. I wasn't surprised with how shiny the tires were, until after about 24 hours it was considerably more shiny. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Best tire cleaner for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Beware on spray painted wheels. This stuff is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Chef BB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not last 6 months but did last more than a month
customer_reviews.author: Mickey M Suhl

customer_reviews.title: Clean n dry your tires first. I used regular car wash soap to clean them
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It has been 6 days since I applied it. I followed the instructions from the other reviewers. I clean n let the tires dried. Then apply it and wait over night. The shines are still there after 6 days. I'm happy with the purchase and its values.
customer_reviews.author: jack chan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just a few sprays and your tires are good for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: It's only "okay"
customer_reviews.text: The shine looks amazing when applied. Unfortunately it only lasts about 2 weeks. I remember Turtle Wax had a product called "Jet Black" tire shine that lasted 3-6 months. I'm still looking for it. This is a poor substitute. And you can find this typically at O'Reilly's auto parts store.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Works as prescribed
customer_reviews.text: works good for the price used for daily driver, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Tire are really black
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I been looking for a product that is cheap and still get my tire looking like new, I tried amor all and it did ok but this product does what is say and my tire look great
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: This worked so so - it didn't produce much of a shine. Not to say it doesn't look better - it's not as it suggests in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: tire shine
customer_reviews.text: its ok but very thin spray and does not last . need to give 2 coats on the wheels and still only lasts a short time
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore A. Giglia

customer_reviews.title: Nice shine
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and works well when it's dry however once it rains and water gets on it it doesn't hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Longer lasting shine than many tire shine products
customer_reviews.text: Great for using on blackwall tires. The sheen remained longer than the oily products made by many companies.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: G
customer_reviews.text: Nice shine with out rubbing make sure you clean the tires real good at first.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time, yet the item leaked.
customer_reviews.text: Does not shine the tires well, at all. Too bad, as AMAZON usually provides good items. Dr. Mike
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mike Huchital

customer_reviews.title: does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Shined 8 rubber floor mats and 8 tires with this and still have about half left.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great price and shine
customer_reviews.text: Can be a little runny but for the price you can’t beat it. Great, long lasting shine.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan H.

customer_reviews.title: great price and product
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love this product! it gets all the grime and stains off my wheels and makes them shine. definitely worth it and for a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Huss

customer_reviews.title: Bottle broken or leaked alot
customer_reviews.text: I was upset about how this order was received. There was liquid (spray wax) spilled all over the box. It had seeped through the box. Which just about a full bottle was leaked “broken “. Two bottles were ok out of three.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: I used this spray on my car and that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this spray on my car and that it was not what I expected. It takes a lot of time to wipe it off from the tire. The price is okay but not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: 13addata

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.  It's very caustic.  Use on factory wheels only.  Would not recommend on Chrome wheels either.
customer_reviews.text: Works okay but it's VERY caustic. Not good for aftermarket, refinished, or painted wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite product! Keeps my wheels and tires clean for about 2-3 weeks!!! It's not like a super shine or anything it just gives it a nice natural tire color and just looks so clean. It's so satisfying to see the brake dust come off and just be wiped away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it suppose to do. Cleans tires real well. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: rspiment

customer_reviews.title: A-
customer_reviews.text: gets majority of dirt and grim out of tires. great purchase for the price. cant beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Cleans fast and easy on wheels. Use it on cool wheels and it works fast. Spray on, agitate a bit and the wheels are clean. Anything that makes car care easier and better is a positive for me!
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is good. This one is good. The price is reasonable and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Z

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly but be sure to follow directions. Anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly but be sure to follow directions. Anything it hits including the floor becomes slippery. I use it to polish shoes too.
customer_reviews.author: Sous Chef

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck product.
customer_reviews.text: Bang for the buck. Removes dirt and grime from the wheels and the tires. Do not forget to agitate with a wheel brush after spraying the foam and letting it sit for 30 seconds per wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Descent
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok product but you definitely do not get the nice shine like you get from a foam product.
customer_reviews.author: Moltar

customer_reviews.title: but it is a good value and a lot easier (and less time consuming) ...
customer_reviews.text: You really need two coats in order to make this stuff shine, but it is a good value and a lot easier (and less time consuming) than the gels.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheels71

customer_reviews.title: Effective but Caustic
customer_reviews.text: This works, but attacks the paint on my wheels if left for more than a moment or two.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Clark

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says, Its a CLEANER, not one of those products that makes the tire look wet, i used this on both of my cars and it took care of brake dust as well as regular dirt that normally kicks up from the road and such
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: it leaves streaks and a cloudy look on chrome wheels ...
customer_reviews.text: it leaves streaks and a cloudy look on chrome wheels and I am not impressed on regular wheels . Turtle Wax needs to work on this product.
customer_reviews.author: SagittariusRoad

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Safe to use, won't deteriorate finish on rims. Got the brake grime that was baked into my rims off with minimal elbow grease needed!
customer_reviews.author: @youlickwindows

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase rim cleaner , it ruined my rims and I had to get them repaired . I will repeat do not buy if you have black rims.
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: Make bigger Brighter signs on the bottle saying first
customer_reviews.text: My rims are ruin. My son didnt read and was hot out and sprayed all 4 rims now they have big white stains all over my rims. I haven’t washed my truck since. Im hurt
customer_reviews.author: Musa uthman

customer_reviews.title: Does ok but runs off the tires quickly during application.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't last long and runs off the tire during application. I use a few other brands normally and do not experience this issue.
customer_reviews.author: JayZ

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: This week it makes my car shine like new, very good
customer_reviews.author: pengyou

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, nice tire shine that seems to last longer than most.
customer_reviews.author: M Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Good on tires. Not for rims
customer_reviews.text: Good on tires. Lifted up all the dirt. Did nothing to the rims tho
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this product before and I like the way it looks and last after application.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed this on my raw aluminum. Bad choice. Only one wheel but still.
customer_reviews.author: ATM

customer_reviews.title: Product condition
customer_reviews.text: One bottle arrived cracked and leaking, transferred the remaining cleaner to another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottle cap leaks
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure if the lid wasn't screwed on properly or if it was damaged in the mail. The other bottle with it was just fine. Not very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not clean the wheel or tire,just leaves a nasty film,waste of money
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, with prompt shipping - two thumbs way up!
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: tire cleaner is good, visibility of dust from tire in foam Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: tire cleaner is good, visibility of dust from tire in foam Cons: tire shine is nothing, I mean literally nothing
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Eats right through brake dust when combined with a wheel brush and a light rinse
customer_reviews.author: CoelacanthsKill

customer_reviews.title: Worked very wel cleans tires good without having to wipe
customer_reviews.text: Worked very wel cleans tires good without having to wipe. If you wipe with a cloth it works better
customer_reviews.author: edgart

customer_reviews.title: This works great
customer_reviews.text: I wash and wax my own suv .... This works great
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, Loved using it and the look it gave my tires
customer_reviews.author: Kobi G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product; wasteful shipping packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Good product; excellent value as Add-On. I bought two bottles. They arrived separately, each wrapped in two large plastic bags, which were then packed in a large box. An embarrassing -- for both me and Amazon -- waste of resources (for a chemical that's likely bad for the environment). So, while I like the product and the price, I can't justify the delivery for future purchases. The delivery issue is not affecting my review of the product, which is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ann

customer_reviews.title: shines
customer_reviews.text: just what i wanted, i spray it on and let it dry to a beautiful finish. ne mess and you do not have to use much.
customer_reviews.author: eshap2

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it would be a masterful product. Although it arrived completely empty with the residue all over the shipping container.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A.

customer_reviews.title: pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes the tires look very nice. Only problem was how it built up on the tires. I have white lettered tires and it will help create some unwanted dirt on letters after rains and such. Kinda gets a little build up of product on the tires which will eventually need a really good scrubbing to get it off. If you're looking for a good sheen on your tires...go with it. I rated it a four because the main purpose for using this is for the dark sheen we all like on our tires. Didn't rate a five because of the buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did OK on the tires, but didn't do a thing for the wheels. 2007 Mustang that had not been washed in a couple weeks, so it had a bit of brake dust on the alloy wheels. Not "grungy" caked-on layers, but a definite brown tint. It would wipe off easily enough, but with the nooks and crannys its a bit of a pain. I purchased this hoping to reduce the effort required. Applied according to directions, and it seemed to clean the sidewalls of the tires but it did *nothing* to the brake dust. Not even a little bit. A second application did not help, nor did longer soak times. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: What's great about this is that it just makes your tires ...
customer_reviews.text: What's great about this is that it just makes your tires look black. And they'll still look black if you drive through rain a couple times. If you want your tires to look dripping wet like you drove through an oil slick go someplace else. If you want your tires to just look smooth and black buy this.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: worked better for me
customer_reviews.text: Other wheel cleaners, Meguiars, Black Magic and Mothers' , worked better for me. I like Black Magic, but Consumer Reports doesn't give it a high rating. The Turtle Wax product required serious scrubbing to get even meager results.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use, poor results, expensive
customer_reviews.text: Painful to use and leaves a haze. Other wheel cleaners work much better, many times for a lower price. Eagle One and Meguiar's are both, easier to use and yield better results. The Turtle Wax wheel cleaner requires: - Wetting the wheel - Spray on the product - Wait - Scrub wheel with a wheel brush - Rinse the wheel - (Probably) Repeat - Dry the wheel with a towel - Remove haze that appeared about 10-15 minutes after drying the wheel. You will need another dry towel for this. All in all, I got two car washes out of one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: dpol

customer_reviews.title: Removes light corrosion. Can't say how it would work ...
customer_reviews.text: Removes light corrosion. Can't say how it would work on break dust as It does not build up on my wheels. Part of a total wheel cleaning system.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down brake dust well. Just spray on and ...
customer_reviews.text: Breaks down brake dust well. Just spray on and let it sit for a few minutes, give it a quick scrub and rinse away.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Put soap and water in spray bottle and save your money. Or use a brush to clean wheels, this stuff is weak
customer_reviews.author: MylesD

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: There are better products out there. Price is acceptable but still could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Edward V. Romero

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: works just as good if not better than Mother's wheel cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. The only drawback is it doesn't last very long
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: nothing after 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: tire look great right after spraying. but after 10 minutes they become just like it was in the beginning. I tried it on the old tires, may be it is more effective with new tires but I don't hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Levani Kikacheishvili

product_meta.title: Turtle Wax 50837 Tire Shine & Wheel Cleaner Kit with Applicator & Microfiber Towel, 46. Fluid_Ounces
product_meta.description: Style:Tire Shine & Wheel Cleaner KitTurtle Wax Wet'N Black Ultra Wet Tire Shine is specially formulated to keep tires looking wet and shiny, locking it in with an exclusive blend of silicone polymers. It protects against UV rays and is also great for black bumpers, weather stripping and hard vinyl trim. Turtle Wax All Wheel & Tire Cleaner uses powerful foaming synthetic brake dust removers to clean all wheel surfaces. Removes brown residue from tires and brightens white sidewall lettering. Non-acid formula is safe for all OEM and aftermarket automotive wheels and tires. Exclusive pack includes (1) 23 Fl Oz. Wet'N Black Ultra Wet Tire Shine, (1) 23 Fl Oz. All Wheel & Tire Cleaner, (1) Tire Applicator, and (1) bonus Microfiber Towel to clean wheels and make them shine.
feature_bullets: Includes (1) 23 Fl Oz. Tire Shine, (1) 23 Fl Oz. All Wheel & Tire Cleaner, (1) Tire Applicator, and (1) bonus Microfiber Towel
Special UV inhibitors help protect against the drying, fading and cracking effects of the sun
Exclusive blend of silicone polymers lock in a long lasting shine
Combines synthetic brake dust removers and grease cutting surface active ingredients to get wheels and tires clean with less effort
Formulated to be safe on all automotive wheel and tire surfaces

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars458 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
